item.title: As this week looks to be dry and extremely hot. Drink plent
item.description: As this week looks to be dry and extremely hot. Drink plenty of water and stay hydrated. Keep an eye on your neighbors. Remember it is very dry as we are in a drought please refrain from outdoor burning of any kind.

item.title: As we are in very dry drought like conditions in Mason Count
item.description: As we are in very dry drought like conditions in Mason County and around our area for the safety of you and your neighbors we ask that you refrain from open burning of any kind.

item.title: We want to take a moment and wish all the students, teachers
item.description: We want to take a moment and wish all the students, teachers, and school personnel a safe and great school year.
